data.name: ReadCase1
data.value: select top(1) NUMB from CKT_CASE where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadCase2
data.value: select distinct T1.NUMB from CKT_CASE T1 join CKT_CASE_ROLE T2 on (T1.NUMB = T2.CAS_NUMBER) and (@cspNumber = T2.CSP_NUMBER) and (T2.START_DATE <= @startDate) and (T2.END_DATE >= @startDate) and (T2.TYPE = 'AP')

data.name: ReadCase3
data.value: select distinct T1.NUMB from CKT_CASE T1 join CKT_CASE_ROLE T2 on (T1.NUMB = T2.CAS_NUMBER) and (@cspNumber = T2.CSP_NUMBER) and (T2.START_DATE <= @startDate) and (T2.END_DATE >= @startDate) and (T2.TYPE = 'AR')

data.name: ReadCaseUnit1
data.value: select CU_NUMBER, START_DATE, CLOSURE_DATE, CAS_NO, CSP_NO_AR, CSP_NO_AP from CKT_CASE_UNIT where @cspNoAp = CSP_NO_AP

data.name: ReadCaseUnit2
data.value: select CU_NUMBER, START_DATE, CLOSURE_DATE, CAS_NO, CSP_NO_AR, CSP_NO_AP from CKT_CASE_UNIT where @cspNoAr = CSP_NO_AR

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadInterstateRequest
data.value: select top(1) IDENTIFIER, KS_CASE_IND, CAS_I_NUMBER from CKT_INTERSTAT_RQST where @casINumber = CAS_I_NUMBER
